replies.body:
Ok, so first you get banned, then get banned another 5 times through alt accounts, 
then you get unbanned. And come back telling all of us to 'watch out the walls god is here'

Then you lose, get angry and talk shit about the person who killed you and you leave.

You applied for my team, only to come back the next day telling me that you don't want to join my team.

You then stop talking to me, but miraculously you ask me if I want to go to your scrim, I said no because it was late my time.

Now, I post telling you not to say whose in your team when I knew for sure coco had never accepted the said request.

You then call me a 'm8' and say how I should not start it again. And I asked why and then you post a link to one of your many leaving posts, inclining that I was the said avicus player to do death threats? First of all, i've ignored you for maybe a month now, and due to our timezones we never play at the same time.

Second of all, I don't know your skype.

Third of all, how do you know it was an avicus player at all?

Like for god sake, calm down!

Why don't we stop replying back and fort, huh?

Point is, you sent me the leaving post link after I asked what you meant about the 'not this time'

and you said 'take a look' with the link of the leaving post...

Now if you really are leaving, then goodbye to you and you should ask for lock on this thread if you're not going to go on with the walls tourney.

-Pat
